entry.title: The Space Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: ReyloTrash2187

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,190Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 60

Summary: Arthur Pendragon has spent his whole life untouched—by kindness, by desire, or anything resembling real intimacy. It never mattered. Not until a certain annoying manservant came to Camelot—Merlin—who disregarded all strict royal etiquette and showed no restraint when it came to sudden, reckless displays of affection. Now, there’s something impossible in the space between them, something Arthur doesn’t know how to name—only that he aches to close the distance.*A slow-burn touched-starved Arthur Pendragon story.*Guys, there was only one bed.Guys, some obscure quest in the cold far-up mountains made them "huddle for warmth".Guys, they might give in to this farm fantasy of theirs.Can't I just put all the tropes in there?This fic is rated MSI for Maximum Self Indulgence.

entry.title: I Was Born From and With It
entry.summary:
Author: Jpg_26862

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,986Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 33

Summary: He had touched magic. He whipped around, his eyes feeling like they were popping out of his skull as he gaped at Arthur. He curled his magic around Arthur, searching, seeking out the sparks he had felt moments before. And there it was. Pulsing through his veins, heightening with his enjoyment of his hunt, quickening his reaction times, making him move faster, pushing him forward. Merlin couldn’t speak a single word, even as Arthur shoved him up against a wall and ordered some of the knights around him to throw him in the dungeons. The Crown Prince of Camelot had magic, and he didn’t even know it.With Merlin's arrival in Camelot, secrets long buried are revealed from every corner, and magic runs deep.

entry.title: Pas de Deux
entry.summary:
Author: Eye_of_Desdemona

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,998Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 40

Summary: “I have seen this all before,” Merlin’s voice was steely though his hands shook at his sides.The old druid merely shook his head, “You have seen visions, Emrys, possibilities. I am offering you a certainty. Arthur’s bane will be his demise. If the boy is left alive, there will be no legacy to Arthur’s reign, only a hazy memory of a sovereign that was born in blood and died in blood.”Merlin’s eyes widened, and a stinging sensation nestled its way into his skin as the druid’s magic filled the room.“The decision is yours to make. The Triple Goddess will make her’s in return.”ORIt was always going to be Arthur. Even if it meant taking the life of one of his own, Merlin was always going to choose the path that saw Arthur live. A seer offers Emrys a choice and a promise in one, and for once Merlin acts upon it.

entry.title: Of Legends and (Rugby) Kings
entry.summary:
Author: grlnxtdr29

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,478Chapters: 2/30Kudos: 9

Summary: The problem with Legends is that, over time, they are altered, misremembered, or forgotten all together. But some Legends are so great, they must be relived, again and again, until they get it right.Nick dreams only of being the Rugby King of Truham Grammar. Beyond that, he has no idea what he wants to do with his future. Until he meets a boy with curly hair, blue eyes, and dimples.Charlie dreams of Dragons, and Magick, of brave Knights, and a quest set before him, to bring back the olde ways, and set right the Legend that has been retold thousands of times. This time, he vows to set the record straight (Or not so straight.)Who knew their Destinies would collide?

entry.title: Checking Out Love
entry.summary:
Author: saintelsewhere

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,076Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 76

Summary: The Ealdor Public Library, where Merlin works as a librarian, is struggling amidst budget cuts and declining patron visits. As a last ditch effort, Library Manager Gaius calls in a favour from his friend Uther Pendragon, CEO of Camelot's top consulting firm, The Pendragon Group.Uther sends his son Arthur to lead the project in Ealdor and work closely with Merlin. The two have a rocky start, but as they spend more time together they come to understand that they might just be perfect for each other after all.--- “I’m taking these sweatpants,” Merlin declared, admiring himself in the standing mirror in Arthur’s bedroom. Arthur stepped up behind him, hands resting on Merlin’s hips, and pressed a kiss behind Merlin’s ear that sent a shiver down Merlin’s body. He can take and keep whatever he wants, Arthur thought, watching the two of them in the mirror, perfectly slotted together. He’s already taken my heart. ---Or, Arthur falls in love with sexy librarian Merlin.

entry.title: Stupid Boys
entry.summary:
Author: Maisie__Moon22

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,007Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 146

Summary: Merlin moved to Camelot as a child with his mother to escape being hunted in Ealodr. On his first night he bumps into an arrogant, pompous, no good golden prince who threatens him with a sword. When Uther pulls him away and bans Merlin from ever coming near his son again, Merlin knows they are destined to be friends.The boys keep their friendship hidden from the public and grow up together, learning from each other in ways no one else could understand. It was all running smoothly… until Merlin had to save his life using magic, and accidentally cementing his place as Arthur’s manservant. Now the boys have to hide that they even know each other, Merlin’s magic, and any other feelings that may get in the way as they try to guide Camelot into a golden age. ORMerlin and Arthur meet as boys and grow up together as mates secretly. Eventually Arthur realises that feeling the way he does about Merlin isn’t how a friend should feel and Merlin is obviously clueless. They’re both clumsy idiots and apparently, stupid boys.

entry.title: Just Between Us, I Remember It
entry.summary:
Author: During_The_Day (The_Night_Tour)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,539Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 28

Summary: Arthur knew what a Sigil represented; a concept he had been introduced to as a young prince, late on those evenings his father could stand his presence for more than a moment. A marriage proposal of the deepest and most romantic kind, a callback to the traditions of old – especially along the Pendragon line.As such, his message was clear. He was going to marry Merlin. No matter what it took.****OR: Arthur’s POV of ‘Just Between Us, Did the Love Affair Maim You Too?’
